channel.title: Protection – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Scratch Protection Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This sleeve is designed for medical practitioners caring for patients with a history of violence. Double layering protects the wearer from scratches targeting the forearms, allowing them to attend to their patient free of harm.

The post Scratch Protection Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Formfitting design keeps the sleeves firmly in place
  • Double layers protect from biting & scratching
  • Available for the forearm or forearm and hand for additional protection

The post Scratch Protection Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads are soft to the touch with a hypoallergenic self adhesive backing to ensure they are fastened securely in the proper position. Ideal for pain under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before trying.

  • Ideal for relieving the burning sensation under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. The product provides excellent pressure relief and redistributes the impact on the heel
  • Low profile ergonomic design makes these a good option for use in any footwear, including open toe sandals, court shoes, boots, high heels or women's shoes with a narrow fit.
  • Reduce discomfort from sore, tired feet, heel pain, heel spurs, blisters, warts, etc.
  • One size fits all. Heel pads measure 3" x 2". Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps pads in place.
  • Sold in pairs. Washable and reusable. Allow to dry naturally.

The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Heel Grips, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The innovative design of double curves and groove keeps heels stretchable and breathable while soft gel reduces the pressure of heels and strengthens heel part with elasticity and shock-absorption.

item.title: Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Toe Spreader fits comfortably in most footwear and helps separate and stretch toe overlap, relieving pressure and friction to the hallux valgus. Inorganic antibacterial ingredients…

The post Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Toe Spreader fits comfortably in most footwear and helps separate and stretch toe overlap, relieving pressure and friction to the hallux valgus. Inorganic antibacterial ingredients can prevent bacterial growth while unique gel memory formulations fit all kinds of foot shape. The materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Get relief from painful foot ailments like plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, strains and sprains. This adjustable compression brace supports the arch while in motion, reducing pain while exercising, hiking or walking. The arch brace also reduces knee, hip and back pain by maintaining proper foot alignment.

The post Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Comfortable, soft and breathable cloth material on the outer layer with shock-absorbing, pressure-reducing, soft gel to relieve the discomfort and pain caused by the arch under compression.

The gel with inorganic antibacterial ingredients can prevent bacterial growth and includes mineral oils and skin care ingredients for skin-moisturizing. Unique gel memory formulations fit all kinds of feet. The materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Arch Sleeve, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Comfortable sleeve supports the foot as soft gel absorbs shock and reduces pressure, relieving arch of the foot pain. The gel contains mineral oils that moisturize the skin while antibacterial components prevent odor.

  • Unique gel memory formulations fit all kinds of feet
  • Comfortable, soft, breathable and hyperelastic fabric
  • Environment-friendly and recyclable

The post Gel Arch Sleeve, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Arch Sleeve, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
